parsed_response.investment_thesis: RLG represents an attractive investment opportunity in the growing reverse logistics sector driven by e-commerce tailwinds. The deal generates a 15.8% IRR and 2.09x MOIC through a combination of revenue growth (7.4% CAGR), operating leverage, and debt paydown. Key risks include execution in high-growth Americas/Asia markets and maintaining gross margins, but the conservative capital structure (4.0x leverage) provides downside protection.
